author: jerenkrantz
msg: Add db4 to the help string.  (It is already detected as a valid option.)

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Allow VPATH builds to build aprutil.exp file by adding a reference to
APR-util's srcdir and using the APR_INCLUDE define.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Subst out APR_INCLUDES so that Makefiles can reference this instead of
trying to determine the APR include path on its own.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Make INCLUDE_RULES reference APR_BUILD_DIR (set by apu-conf.m4) instead
of assuming that apr is in ../apr
